Rajendrakumar R. Nair

BSc Chemistry · MSc Yoga Therapy

Certified International Yoga Teacher (Yoga Alliance)

40+ Years of Experience in Traditional Hatha Yoga & Meditation

I am a lifelong practitioner and teacher of Yoga, deeply rooted in the classical yogic tradition and supported by scientific understanding. My life’s mission is to guide individuals toward balance, awareness, and inner harmony.

YogaPlanet is a global digital initiative created to spread the timeless wisdom of Yoga across the world—uniting ancient knowledge with modern technology for holistic well-being.

“Let Yoga unite humanity. Let peace begin within.”
